# ModemPay

ModemPay is a payment infrastructure that enables businesses to collect payments and manage payouts across multiple channels in Africa.

## Getting Started

- [Quickstart Guide](https://docs.modempay.com/documentation/quickstart): Set up your account and start collecting payments with HTML Checkout or SDK
- [Installation](https://docs.modempay.com/documentation/installation): Install ModemPay SDK in your preferred programming language
- [Authentication](https://docs.modempay.com/documentation/authentication): Learn how to authenticate API requests using API keys
- [Handling Errors](https://docs.modempay.com/documentation/errors): Understand error codes and how to handle API errors

## Core API Resources

- [Balances](https://docs.modempay.com/documentation/core/balances): Check your account balance and transaction history
- [Managing Customers](https://docs.modempay.com/documentation/core/customers): Create and manage customer profiles
- [Mandate](https://docs.modempay.com/documentation/core/mandates): Set up recurring payment mandates
- [Payment Links](https://docs.modempay.com/documentation/core/payment-links): Generate payment links for quick checkouts
- [Transactions](https://docs.modempay.com/documentation/core/transactions): View and manage all payment transactions
- [Webhooks](https://docs.modempay.com/documentation/core/webhooks): Configure webhooks for real-time payment notifications
- [Webhook Tester (CLI)](https://docs.modempay.com/documentation/core/webhook-cli): Test webhook integrations using CLI tool
- [Coupons](https://docs.modempay.com/documentation/core/coupons): Create and manage discount coupons

## Payment Intents

- [Payment Intents Overview](https://docs.modempay.com/documentation/payment-intents/overview): Understand the Payment Intent object and its properties
- [Create a Payment Intent](https://docs.modempay.com/documentation/payment-intents/create): Generate payment intents with various configurations
- [Direct Charge](https://docs.modempay.com/documentation/payment-intents/direct-charge): Process direct charges without customer interaction
- [Payment Intent Callbacks](https://docs.modempay.com/documentation/payment-intents/callback_url): Handle callbacks after payment completion
- [Manage Payment Intent](https://docs.modempay.com/documentation/payment-intents/management): Update and retrieve payment intent status

## Split Payments

- [Split Payments Overview](https://docs.modempay.com/documentation/split-payments/overview): Distribute payments across multiple recipients
- [Sub-Accounts](https://docs.modempay.com/documentation/split-payments/sub-accounts): Create and manage sub-accounts for split payments
- [Initialize Split Payment](https://docs.modempay.com/documentation/split-payments/initialize-payment): Set up payment splitting for transactions

## Payouts

- [Payouts Overview](https://docs.modempay.com/documentation/payouts/overview): Send money to mobile money accounts
- [Mobile Money Payouts](https://docs.modempay.com/documentation/payouts/mobile-money): Transfer funds to mobile money networks
- [Payout Fees](https://docs.modempay.com/documentation/payouts/fees): Calculate transfer fees before sending payouts

## Billing

- [Invoices Introduction](https://docs.modempay.com/billing/invoices/introduction): Create and manage invoices for your customers

## Inline Payments

- [Inline Payments Overview](https://docs.modempay.com/payments/overview): Embed payment forms directly into your website

## Laravel Integration

- [Laravel Quickstart](https://docs.modempay.com/laravel/quickstart): Integrate ModemPay with Laravel applications

## Plugins

- [WooCommerce Plugin](https://docs.modempay.com/plugins/woocommerce): Accept payments in your WooCommerce store
